resources.string:
Please attach a device that is able to run with this demo. This demo is designed to work with the following demos provided in the Microchip Application Libraries USB framework (www.microchip.com/usb):
 LibUSB Demo
 WinUSB Demo
 MCHPUSB Demo
 Custom HID Demo
Press the button below to toggle the LEDs on the attached board.
The box below indicates the push button status of the attached board.
The bar below indicates the percentage of rotation of the potentiometer.
